Q.heading: add todo_main function
Q.info: change name of main function to todo_main function

Q.heading: Add proper documentation in source code
Q.info: Add descriptive docstrings wherever they are necessary

A.source_code:
from Todo import TodoApp

def todo_main() -> None:
    ''' Main Function For ToDo App '''
app: TodoApp = TodoApp()
    app.start()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    todo_main()

Q.heading: Unit Test for User input Function
Q.info: Write unit test with pytest for user_input method

A.source_code:
from user_input import user_input

def test_user_input():
 # Test input 1
 assert user_input('1') == 1
 # Test input 2
 assert user_input('2') == 2
 # Test input 3
 assert user_input('3') == 3
 # Test other input
 assert user_input('4') == '4'
 # Test exception handling
 assert user_input('abc') == None
